website_summaries.verdict: This double breast pump is safe, durable, and proven to perform.
pros: Offers bilateral lactation to ensure moms can empty their breasts in just minutes
Double breast pump is USB-rechargeable, enabling you to recharge it via computer or power bank
Includes 9 adjustable levels and massage suction for outstanding comfort
cons: Double breast pump sometimes malfunctions, even after limited use

customer_reviews.title: Great pump easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Amazon shipped it inside the company box so no damage to the product. Easy to use and very convenient for travel purpose. Two baby bottles were included and you can control the sucking speed so it is not painful at all. So far very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ramvi

customer_reviews.title: For the price you just cannot go wrong! Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am so impressed with the quality of this double pump for the price! I’m on my third baby now and the last one I had cost me nearly $200. I am so happy I stumbled across this on Amazon! So easy to set up, The instructions were extremely clear and easy to follow, so easy to clean and comfortable to use! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara CT

customer_reviews.title: Power source not working
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in and main device (power source ) does not work. I watched the assembly video and tried it on 3 different outlets. How do I get in touch with manufacturer?
customer_reviews.author: Dionne Harris

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: Getting ready for our new family member and very excited to receive it. Very nice product and didn't find anything wrong yet, will update after using for a while.
customer_reviews.author: howmilyan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! What a great buy! Works like an expensive one and is so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not express my milk! Terrible pump.
customer_reviews.text: Did not express my milk well at all, caused frustration and upset, had to get formula!!!! I was able to hand express more than this machine could. Purchased a modela instead and have had a much better experience!!! DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: J Heck

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in October 2018 and it worked great up until march 19, 2019. This should come with a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jahann EStewart

customer_reviews.title: I Like
customer_reviews.text: 😀😀The packaging is good. It's great to be ready for a second baby without the hassle of having a first baby by hand
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I was using hand pump but that was so painful and time taking. I bought this and made my life easier. It is quick and soft. Battery timing is amazing. It has many functions and you can control like speed and timing etc. Loving it.
customer_reviews.author: willfang

customer_reviews.title: It almost tore my nipples off, but it did the job.
customer_reviews.text: It's got great suction but if you're wanting comfort with power this probably isn't right for people. It almost tore my nipples off.
customer_reviews.author: sarah boettcher

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is clearly used. All of the parts were thrown in the box. Also very painful to use and I was only able to get 3oz total when I normally get 5 with my Medela. If I could give zero stars I would. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was working great not sure what happened
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pump however it stopped sucking about 1 month after use , I’m not sure if I got a defective one
customer_reviews.author: Vannessa

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: This breast pump is really good highly recommended ,very easy to clean and put away
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Ready for the newborn!
customer_reviews.text: My wife was very happy with this purchase -- we just had our first child and although it is overwhelming, we are getting through it together. For the price, this kit is a good deal. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: good product!
customer_reviews.text: This electric breast pump is easier to use than I thought. The brest pumps are ultra-quiet,it's easier breast emptying,so can save my time for pumping,I have more sleep time in the evening. The breastfeeding bottle has no smell. This is much more comfortable than I used to use a manual breast pump.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pan

customer_reviews.title: Received Filthy (see photos)
customer_reviews.text: I put this item on my baby registry and it was one of the first items purchased as a pump is an important item. I literally just opened it in preparation for my Nov 4th due date and it's filthy. I can only assume that I was sent a returned item that was not properly cleaned. I was debating on just washing and using it anyways, but realized that as this is my first child, I need a better start. Also, this pump does not fit the Dr Brown bottles that I have stock piled, so I'm sure I can find a better purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G Brown

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Breast Pump
customer_reviews.text: The pump is small and portable. It is also very quiet and efficient. I love it. Great for new and experienced Moms.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzy Dawkins-Julien

product_meta.title: Gland Double Electric Breast Pump. Breastfeeding Breast Pump Dual of Germany PPSU Ultra-Quiet Powerful 9 Levels Massage Suction. HD LCD Display.
feature_bullets: ♥ SAFE MATERIAL: Germany imported PPSU material for breastfeeding bottle . safe and hygiene. 100% BPA free. no peculiar smell.

♥ POWERFUL & EFFICIENT : 9 levels adjustable massage suction , The breast pump has 2 care modes: Massage and Breast-Pump Mode. Adjustable 9 suction levels for mom’s comfort.empty breast in 15 minutes . double pumps save you up to 50% time.

♥ SMART & ULTRA-QUIET: memory function remember your customized settings. The working noise of the pump is less than 55DB. The silicone massage pad can prevent leaking breast milk, and provides a pleasant pumping experience for moms.
♥ PORTABLE & Memory Function – Ultralight and rechargeable design makes it easy for moms to carry around. The LCD screen provides a back-lit reading which is suitable for pumping at night time.
♥Easy To Use: You can easily control the suction mode, adjust the strength, farewell to the breast pain. Breast pump parts are easy to assemble and clean.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars40 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
